name: The Brooklyn Cocktail
description: The Brooklyn may be less well-known that its neighbor, but it's equally delicious. The maraschino liqueur (we recommend Luxardo) adds a rich sweetness, which compensates for the fact that dry rather than sweet vermouth is used.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 ounce Amer Picon, Ramazzotti, or a few dashes Angostura or orange bitters

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients with ice and stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
